Name: Great Houses of the Inner Sphere
Details: The Great Houses are the ruling families of the six major powers of the Inner Sphere: House Davion (Federated Suns), House Kurita (Draconis Combine), House Liao (Capellan Confederation), House Marik (Free Worlds League), House Steiner (Lyran Commonwealth), and the reborn House Cameron (Terran Hegemony).
